HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 206

congVote.result: So the motion to fix convening time was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: Motion to Fix Next Convening Time
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Agreed to the Holding motion that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet Tuesday, December 19, 2017 at 9 a.m. for morning-hour debate, by a yea-and-nay vote of 216 yeas to 169 nays, Roll No. 685.

titleInfo.title: STEM RESEARCH AND EDUCATION EFFECTIVENESS AND TRANSPARENCY ACT

extension.searchTitle: STEM RESEARCH AND EDUCATION EFFECTIVENESS AND TRANSPARENCY ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 206

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: STEM Research and Education Effectiveness and Transparency Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4375, amended, to provide for a study on broadening participation in certain National Science Foundation research and education programs, and to collect data on Federal research grants to science agencies, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 376 yeas to 9 nays, Roll No. 686;

extension.searchTitle: KEEP AMERICA'S REFUGES OPERATIONAL ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 206

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 3979, amended, to amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer services, community partnership, and refuge education programs of the National Wildlife Refuge System, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 371 yeas to 14 nays, Roll No. 687;
